data.description: Huge price reduction to 239,900!!! Welcome to 24501 Seneca, nestled in the coveted Palmer Woods Manor subdivision. This meticulously maintained residence boasts a rich history, having been lovingly cared for by its original owner. With four bedrooms, two full baths, two half baths and 2,104 sq. ft., this home offers the perfect blend of comfort and style.  As you approach this brick exterior beauty, you'll be struck by its timeless appeal and undeniable curb appeal. Beyond the welcoming façade lies a treasure trove of recent mechanical upgrades, ensuring modern comfort and peace of mind.  Newer A/C, water heater, as well as a newer washing machine and dryer.   The fenced backyard offers the ideal space for outdoor activities, gardening, and entertaining. Whether you're enjoying a weekend barbecue or simply relaxing in your own private sanctuary, you'll find solace in this beautiful outdoor space.  Inside, you'll discover the generous and well-designed layout of this home. The bedrooms are all well-proportioned, providing comfortable retreats for everyone in the family. The primary suite has its own private full bath and two closets for your wardrobe.  The open concept design of the dining room and living room creates a warm and inviting atmosphere, perfect for gatherings with friends and family. Natural light streams through large windows, highlighting the inviting character of these living spaces.  In addition to the above, the basement includes custom built in closets for storage, a cedar closet, a half bath and a workshop, ideal for your DIY projects and hobbies. The possibilities for customization and personalization are endless in this space.   Also located near the Rackham golf course, Don't miss your chance to make 24501 Seneca your forever home. Contact us today to schedule a viewing!
